extendedInfo.description: Want to see Bad Badtz-maru wave his arms to show you the time? Now, Sanrio Alarm Clock gives you four options! Youâll have Hello Kittyâs friends - Bad Badtz-maru, My Melody, KEROKERO KEROPPI and Pompom Purin on the clock. Check back for more updates with new characters. ***Key features:- Change themes as you like.- Wake up with your favorite iPod Music or selected alarm. - Multiple Alarms with Background Capabilities. - World Clock: Search for the city and it will give you the current time of that city. - Both English and Chinese available.   Keyword: Sanrio, Alarm Clock, Bad Badtz-maru, My Melody, KEROKERO KEROPPI, Pompom Purin, Multiple alarms, World Clock

reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.title: Exellent
